Options._comment_: For additional languages see the ./Res folder.  To add a language, copy the en-US.json file and rename it to the appropriate language code.  Then translate the values.

InfoLevel._comment_: Please refer to the AsBuiltReport project contributing guide for information about how to define InfoLevels.
0 = Disabled, 1 = Enabled / Summary, 2 = Adv Summary, 3 = Detailed, 4 = Adv Detailed, 5 = Comprehensive
